title: 'Unable to access these remotes' error on server.
body:
#### What is the problem?

I've been trying to download the Prevent-AD (both the BIDS and non-BIDS versions) and the Multicenter Single Subject Human MRI Phantom datasets from the CONP ( [https://github.com/CONP-PCNO/conp-dataset] ) on a Compute Canada headnode using DataLad, but I run into the following error when I run 'datalad get' on their files:

```
[ERROR  ] from datalad...; Unable to access these remotes: datalad; Try making some of these repositories available:; 	cf13d535-b47c-5df6-8590-0793cb08a90a -- [datalad]; ; (Note that these git remotes have annex-ignore set: origin) [get(/home/$user$/$projects$/$name$/conp-dataset/projects/preventad-open/1004359/PREBL00/images/preventad_1004359_PREBL00_asl_001.mnc)] 
get(error): projects/preventad-open/1004359/PREBL00/images/preventad_1004359_PREBL00_asl_001.mnc (file) [from datalad...; Unable to access these remotes: datalad; Try making some of these repositories available:; 	cf13d535-b47c-5df6-8590-0793cb08a90a -- [datalad]; ; (Note that these git remotes have annex-ignore set: origin)]
action summary:
  get (error: 1, notneeded: 1)
```
I am able to get the other CONP datasets on the server with no issues, but these three datasets sourced from LORIS all result in the same error. 
Locally, on my personal laptop, however, I am able to successfully 'get' files from the datasets in question with no errors, so the issue is only present on the server.

#### What steps will reproduce the problem?

On the server I am running the commands:
datalad install -r http://github.com/CONP-PCNO/conp-dataset
datalad get projects/preventad-open/1004359/PREBL00/images/preventad_1004359_PREBL00_asl_001.mnc

#### What version of DataLad are you using (run `datalad --version`)? On what operating system (consider running `datalad wtf`)?

Currently I am using DataLad version 0.12.6, and git-annex version 8.20200330. I have tried a number of different versions of DataLad (including 0.13.0rc2) and git-annex, and they resulted in the same error. The server is CentOS 7.7.1908.

#### Is there anything else that would be useful to know in this context?

`git annex whereis preventad_1004359_PREBL00_bold_001.mnc`
Running 'git-annex whereis' and 'git-annex get' on the file there is no output (even using verbose mode). It's as if I'd hit enter on the terminal without writing any commands. Running either of these commands on debug mode prints various "process done ExitSuccess" and no errors.

I have also tried installing the dataset in a different directory to no avail.

#### Have you had any success using DataLad before? (to assess your expertise/prior luck.  We would welcome your testimonial additions to https://github.com/datalad/datalad/wiki/Testimonials as well)
I have had success getting the other CONP datasets on the server, and getting the files in question locally.

Thank you very much for your help!
